name: EuroCoinFlip
description:
The EuroCoinFlip brings the real life fun leisure game to your screen.  The point of the game is to get as many times as you can the number side or the head side of the coin  while you're flipping the coin in a row.  The game displays the highest appearance rates of the head and the number sides, while also showing the user the current flipped coin side's appearance rate.

Game controls

this game is controlled with one button.
